post.title: Just the Way You Are (Billy Joel cover)
post.videoDescription:
Listen to and/or order my debut album here: http://music.iancanderson.com

Another ICA YouTube cover, this time a love song by the great Billy Joel.

Vocal chain: Ian's voice --- CAD M179 microphone --- RME Fireface 800 mic pre/converter
Electric piano chain: Casio CDP100 (MIDI) --- Kontakt 2's "Electric Piano" instrument
Recorded and mixed in Cockos Reaper 3.

For of my music (originals and covers), visit http://www.iancanderson.net or http://www.myspace.com/iancanderson
Thanks for watching/listening!
